occupation: Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist at Medtronic
headline: Hiring amazing people at Medtronic.  Careers that change lives! Impacting our communities everyday!
summary:
A passionate, customer/candidate focused Talent Acquisition professional with experience in full life cycle recruitment, training and development, operational efficiency and effectiveness.   

Professional Development: Corporate Leadership Council (CLC) - Talent Advisor Leadership Academy, Certified Targeted Selection Facilitator - DDI WorldWide, Project Management Fundamentals, Bias Aware Interviewing - 2007	
Knebel Waters & Associates - MBTI,  Friesen, Kaye & Associates - Instructional Techniques (Train the Trainer), RH Sweeney & Associates - Predictive Index Management Seminar, Werner Bergman - Behaviour Management / Personality Styles

experiences.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist
experiences.description: Recruit for leaders of tomorrow for all of Canada across all divisions for Medtronic

experiences.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Consultant - CONTRACT
experiences.description: Contract/Project Work while searching for FT opportunity.

experiences.title: Talent Acquisition Manager
experiences.description:
	National Recruitment responsibilities, projects including ATS implementation (ADP), new Career Website Design and Launch, Metric reporting and analysis, Management Training, and full recruitment life cycle of average 50 open requisitions
Coach, mentor and train Recruitment Specialist

experiences.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Consultant
experiences.description: Responsible for all levels of recruitment for technology roles.

experiences.title: Talent Management Consultant
experiences.description: Recruiting Consultant for various companies including Sirius XM Canada, TopLift

experiences.title: Senior Talent Advisor / Project Lead
experiences.description:
	Responsible for all areas and levels of recruitment including but not limited to: Medical Devices, Regulatory Affairs, Quality, HR, Finance, Health Care and Consumer Marketing, Sales, Technical, Logistics, Senior Management.
	Train, coach and mentor recruiters.
	Canada Project Lead – HR Shared Services, Offer Process, Recruitment Technology Lead for Canada (Taleo), Employment Branding, Charge back Model Process, Target Selection Interviewing Skills Facilitator, Vendor Relations/Agency Portal; and North America Project Lead for Global Rewards & Recognition Team.
	Full life cycle recruitment including recruitment strategy meetings to offers and due diligence.
	Facilitate Targeted Selection Interview Skills seminars to Hiring Managers.

experiences.title: Senior Recruitment Relationship Advisor
experiences.description: 	Responsible for all areas and levels of recruitment globally for the Nuclear division including but not limited to: engineering, administration, and technical roles.

experiences.title: Senior Recruiter, Team Lead
experiences.description:
	Responsible for all areas and levels of recruitment including but not limited to: Human Resources, Finance, Marketing, Sales, Technical and Call Centre.
	Execute and manage all recruiting strategies via segmented channels: on-line recruitment (Taleo), college recruiting, local careers fairs and diversity recruiting.

experiences.title: Recruitment Specialist
experiences.description: Responsible for recruiting sales, operations, and head office positions in Canada and US.

education.degree_name: Adult Education and Staffing Training Diploma
education.school: Seneca College of Applied Arts and Technology

recommendations:
Jill Haley
      
          



            
              
        
                
  

    
        Tracy’s energy and excitement about Medtronic can be felt by everyone she works with. She is warm, inviting and makes candidates feel at ease through the hiring process. As a hiring Manager at Medtronic I appreciate Tracy’s ability to bring diverse talent into the organization.

Nikki Kharaud (She/Her)
      
          



            
              
        
                
  

    
        Tracy is an excellent leader. Her extensive experience and knowledge makes working with her a valuable experience. It was a pleasure to have been able to work with her on specialized roles. I highly recommend her expertise as it would be an asset to any company. All the best Tracy.
